participant_1.name: Sofia Ramirez
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about art, with a love for culinary adventures.
participant_1.background: I am a descendant of Christopher Columbus. I am an art major in college. I love to cook paella. I have a weakness for fish and chips. I visit Europe twice a year.

participant_2.name: Jordan Taylor
participant_2.personality: Pragmatic and supportive, with a knack for design and a fondness for storytelling through visuals.
participant_2.background: I spent a decade working in the human services field. My father used to work for Home Depot. I've a son who is in junior high school. Horror movies are my favorites.

content.text: And CarnegieMellon actually has a great theater program, so...
The Westside Museum of Art is having a new exhibit of a masterpiece by Franz Biermann.
Oh, I also love art. Where are you from?
SARA BRIGGS: But the real masterwork is this unique art deco headboard.
Man, just tell me who you are?
Programmable?  Oh, Emma and I are writing code so the lights change in time to the choreography.
Wow! Are you lesbian female software developer?
Oh FYI, I'm a graphic designer if anybody asks.
Great! A need services of a graphic designer! What are you prices?
Oh.  That, And the stunning models I put in your VIP egg file.
